title: Border, 1650–99
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace of discontinuous tape
dimensions:
H x W x D: 48 x 16.4 cm (18 7/8 x 6 7/16 in.)
Repeat H: 33 cm (13 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border in a large-scale serpentine design of floral and foliated forms. Pattern connected by brides. Modes: portes, point mignon, gaze quadrillée.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1650–99.
1650–99. Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace of discontinuous tape. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-277.
